name: CLICKERS (Dani made game like this years ago, and call it "his worst game", I recreated it)
name_original: CLICKERS (Dani made game like this years ago, and call it "his worst game", I recreated it)
description:
Dani made game like this called "clicker", which in one of his video he called "this is worst game, he has made" so, I recreated it by changing many things. Here it is.
Also, this was a speedrun, I made it under 2 hours, so there isn't any main menu or music, because I suck too.
SO IF YOU FEEL IT BORING, SORRY.

for keyboard:
use "space" for player 1
use "enter" for player 2

for gamepad:
use "a" for player 1
use "y"for player 2
